data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_avg_wait_time
data.type: average time the master waited for a slave to reply, in microseconds.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_wait_time
data.type: total time the master waited for slave replies, in microseconds.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_waits
data.type: total number of times the master waited for slave replies.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_no_times
data.type: number of times the master turned off semisynchronous replication.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_no_tx
data.type: number of commits that have not been successfully acknowledged by a slave.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_status
data.type: whether or not semisynchronous replication is currently operating on the master. the value will be

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_timefunc_failures
data.type: number of times the master failed when calling a time function, such as gettimeofday().

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_avg_wait_time
data.type: average time the master waited for each transaction, in microseconds.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_wait_time
data.type: total time the master waited for transactions, in microseconds.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_waits
data.type: total number of times the master waited for transactions.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_pos_backtraverse
data.type: total number of times the master waited for an event that had binary coordinates lower than previous events waited for. occurs if the order in which transactions start waiting for a reply is different from the order in which their binary log events were written.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_sessions
data.type: number of sessions that are currently waiting for slave replies.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_master_yes_tx
data.type: number of commits that have been successfully acknowledged by a slave.

data.name: Rpl_semi_sync_slave_status
data.type: whether or not semisynchronous replication is currently operating on the slave.
